entry.title: Ritter Sport Milk Chocolate with Joghurt - 100g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ritter Sport
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.79

Made with Alpine Milk

Ritter Sport with Joghurt

Did you know Ritter Sport was the first to produce a yogurt chocolate?! In 1971 they introduced their¬†Milk Chocolate with Joghurt and today it's a cult favourite. Each bar is filled with¬†slightly tart and tangy¬†yoghurt filling made from fine skim milk and then coated with just enough milk chocolate. The tangy and tart notes compliment the sweet and aromatic taste of¬†the milk chocolate. Let it melt in your mouth today!

Ritter Sport are a small German family business that was established in 1912. Now sold in over 80 countries including Canada!

100 g

entry.title: Japanese Kit Kat Spring Bun - 118g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 13.99

A Taste of Japan

12 Kit Kat Snack Size Candy Bars per Bag

Kit Kat never misses! Introducing Kit Kat Spring Bun, influenced by the culture of Japan. Spring Buns are¬†steamed buns filled with a sweet red bean paste and are¬†a traditional Japanese treat that is sold near hot springs in Japan.¬†Kit Kat¬†has recreated this snack by inserting red bean cream in between the traditional wafers and wrapping them in light brown chocolate.

Traditionally, these Kit Kats are only available near¬†hot springs in¬†Japan as a souvenir snack. However, Nestle Japan has decided to make these¬†Spring Bun¬†Kit Kats available for a limited time only.

120g

Reese's Nutrageous is a candy bar made by the Hershey Company that was first introduced in 1994.
